cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: Bringing out fire(?) in (i.e. from?) heaven
(Saying) I want to cast(?) ... before the troops in the mountain(?)
Battle and combat have drawn near
The plans of the gods, loved by An/the god(s)(?) ... destroyed
You(?) have made Gibil (god of fire) consume in the land
If my god has been made aware, he should avenge/reply and not(?) ...
